fields.name: Fridge Check
fields.description: Find one food item in your fridge or cupboard that needs to be eaten soon and plan a meal around it to prevent waste.

fields.name: Inbox Detox
fields.description: Delete at least 50 unnecessary emails or files to reduce digital storage emissions.

fields.name: Light Patrol
fields.description: Take 5 minutes to check for any unnecessary lights on in the house/area you are in.

fields.name: Unplug Devices
fields.description: Unplug at least three devices or appliances that are not in use to reduce energy waste.

fields.name: Natural Light Boost
fields.description: Open curtains/blinds and turn off artificial lights for 1 hour.

fields.name: Litter Grabber
fields.description: Pick up 3 pieces of trash in your immediate area.
